definition: cable reel and harness used to lower oneself to safety (e.g. from a building on fire)
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: Equip the high-grade inner hydraulic pressure slow descent enginery.
sentences.chinese: 配有內藏式高級液壓緩降器。
